ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit Maintains a map of HTTP request handlers keyed by a request URI pattern. @B_org#apache#http#protocol#HttpRequestHandler_E@ instances can be looked up by request URI using the @B_org#apache#http#protocol#HttpRequestHandlerResolver_E@ interface. Patterns may have three formats: * *<uri> <uri>*
